tidyindex 0.0.1

Pre-built indexes

Source: R/compute-builtin-indexes.R
indexes.Rd

Pre-built indexes

Usage

idx_spei(
  data,
  id,
  time,
  .pet_method = "thornthwaite",
  .tavg,
  .lat,
  .scale = 12,
  .dist = loglogistic(),
  .new_name = ".index"
)

idx_spi(data, id, time, .dist = gamma(), .scale = 12, .new_name = ".index")

idx_rdi(
  data,
  id,
  time,
  .pet_method = "thornthwaite",
  .scale = .scale,
  .new_name = ".index"
)

idx_edi(data, id, time, .scale = 12, .new_name = ".index")

Arguments

data

data

id

id

time

time

.pet_method

PET method

.tavg

average temperature

.lat

latitude

.scale

scale

.dist

distribution

.new_name

new names

Value

calculated indexes

Examples

library(lmomco)
library(lubridate)
tenterfield |> init(id = id, time = ym) |>
   idx_spei(.tavg = tavg, .lat = lat)
#> Error in augment(dist_fit(aggregate(dimension_reduction(var_trans(data,     .method = !!.pet_method, .vars = tavg, lat = lat, .new_name = "pet"),     diff = aggregate_manual(~prcp - pet)), .var = diff, .scale = .scale),     .dist = .dist, .method = "lmoms", .var = .agg), .var = .agg,     .new_name = .new_name): could not find function "augment"
tenterfield |> init(id = id, time = ym) |> idx_spi()
#> Error in augment(dist_fit(aggregate(data, .var = prcp, .scale = .scale),     .dist = .dist, .method = "lmoms", .var = .agg), .var = .agg,     .new_name = .new_name): could not find function "augment"
tenterfield |> init(id = id, time = ym) |> idx_edi()
#> Error in var_trans(aggregate(dimension_reduction(data, mult = aggregate_manual(~prcp *     rev(digamma(dplyr::row_number() + 1) - digamma(1)))), .var = mult,     .scale = .scale, sum, .new_name = "ep"), .method = rescale_zscore,     .vars = ep, .new_name = .new_name): could not find function "var_trans"
